snippet: Just hours after Marissa Mayer, chief executive of Yahoo, announced a plan to spin off the tech giant’s core Internet business, she gave birth to identical twin daughters.
lead_paragraph: Just hours after Marissa Mayer, chief executive of Yahoo, announced a plan to spin off the tech giant’s core Internet business, she gave birth to identical twin daughters.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Mayer Gives Birth to Twin Girls
headline.print_headline: Yahoo’s Mayer Gives Birth To Twin Girls
